contest-event.event-date: Sept. 25, 1937 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship Pageantry Alexandra Palace (Concert Room), Alexandra Park, Haringey, Greater London, England, UK Note: Henry Geehl was appointed referee. Prizes: 1st: 50 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 45 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 40 Pounds plus the W W Grant Memorial Trophy 4th: 35 Pounds plus gold mounted baton 5th: 30 Pounds 6th: 10 Pounds May 5, 2010, 11:53 a.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:29 p.m. 1 Fodens Band Fred Mortimer 2 The GUS Band William Halliwell 3 Black Dyke Band William Halliwell 4 Enfield Band Edward Sydney Carter 5 Creswell Colliery Band Harold Moss 6 Cooperation Band J. A. Greenwood 7 Friary Brewery J. A.
